title: Current Client Status
body: The situation of the current client is appalling and atrocious, the match making lobby is currently finicky and when joining games for champ select it sometimes takes an entire 10 seconds to join, the loading screen can do this too. I would like to know if anything is going to be done about this and when something is going to be done about it because I am clearly not the only one.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Worry not as the [league client update is on it's way!](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/client-update)

Although still in alpha, the LCU is constantly being updated and improved upon and is already quite a substantial improvement over the Adobe AIR client.
